Reviews.Title: Same remote control as earlier reviewer
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: Nice TV but if I hit a channel button on the remote control, the TV reverts to it's factory setup.  It's very frustrating.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: raulgonzalez01
Reviews.Content: great tv....have had zero issues...great quality..!! I decided on Westinghouse because the price was very reasonable and the quality of the product is excellent..!! much recomended

Reviews.Title: Does The Job
Reviews.Author: El Rey
Reviews.Content: I've owned this LED for 4 months, and I have to tell you that I'm pretty satisfied with its performance. No "Bells and Whistles" or extra features. But, if you need a T.V. in an extra room for the kids or guests, this one does the job at a very attractive price. I will confess, I purchased the extended warrantee "Just-In-Case." Since the price of this LED was so reasonable it was worth the extra expense to have that peace of mind.

Reviews.Title: love my new 32in TV
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: Love my new westinghouse TV, its great product was shipped quickly and I recommend buying Westinghouse product to anyone. I only bought mine for 175...not to brag

Reviews.Title: Great Set For The Price
Reviews.Author: Bruce Rambusek
Reviews.Content: I have been looking for some time to purchase a set for the bedroom. I just got tired of looking at the 19" screen on my Mitsubishi 26 year old set which still works perfectly. WalMart had a presidents day sale,so I picked up this set for($200.00).Watched a few video reviews on Utube and the reviews were pretty good. My daughter has a 40" lcd set and my mother has a 26" Westinghouse for about 2 years now. Neither on has had any problems with their sets. Even though I have only had this set a short time the picture is very good and the audio is acceptable. Set up was easy and I have a Dish Hopper and a Bluray player hooked up. The Blu ray display is excellent. Of course if you do not have Hi Def in your home the picture will not display well. Some of my cable channels are not hi Def or if you watch old tv series the definition isn't as good.  One tip I picked up on reading other reviews is that when you initially set up you new tv there is a display mode. If you set the picture up in Retail mode or display mode the picture is brighter, a better display. In conclusion I am very happy with this set. Great price,great performance.

Reviews.Title: Worst Customer Response Company on the Planet
Reviews.Author: Yankee Gindoff "Yankeeg"
Reviews.Content: I own this model. The TV keeps reverting to the setup screen. I contacted Westinghouse many times and all they could say is "Someone will get back to you within 24 hours". Well..... many days have passed with many follow ups by me and NO ONE has called. Westinghouse is off my list even if it is for free!!!

Reviews.Title: Westinghouse does not stand by product.
Reviews.Author: scoob
Reviews.Content: Bought a tv on Black Friday from Westinghouse. TV defective. Westinghouse will not stand by warranty. Product is subpar. Customer service ineffective.

Reviews.Title: Mediocre picture. No legacy inputs.
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: Bought as a replacement for my bedroom tv. Not much info on the box. (Model number is only on shipping label). Didn't realize they made TVs with VGA inputs, but no RGB. Assumed 1/8" audio jack was headphones. It is a redundant audio in. No way to get signal in or variable audio out. Not useful to me. Would give it a better rating if it looked as good on, as it does off.

ProductInfo.Features:
1366 x 768 resolution - Supports 720p signals for stunning images.
Two 8W speakers - Deliver a lush soundscape.
Inputs Include - 1 PC, 2 HDMI, 1 RF, 1 component video and 1 composite.
100,000:1 dynamic contrast ratio (2000:1 native) - For an arresting viewing experience.
Additional handy features - Include a sleep timer.
ProductInfo.Name: Westinghouse EW32S3PW - 32" Class / LED / 720p / 60Hz / HDTV
